name: Red Gardener
description:
Somewhere in the infinite void, someone is trying desperately to create something. All their attempts have taken too long to come to fruition, and so it's the Gardener's job to pull the weeds out by the roots...

Controls:

Standard RPG Maker controls apply:

Arrow Keys - Move

Z - Confirm/Interact

X - Cancel/Open menu

Shift - Hold to run/Skip text (Be careful when using this)

These can also be configured to controller buttons using the F1 menu, if you like.

Technical Notes:

This game only works on Windows because I can't figure out how to let RPG Maker be compatible with anything else, sorry.

I could have spent more time polishing things but I wanted to get something out as soon as possible, even if means things may be a bit rough. Still, I do want to improve at writing and really all aspects of game development, so if you end up playing it let me know what you thought! (I may update the game if there are any typos or softlocks but it's taken enough time as it is.)

The game is approximately 2-3 hours long.
